# gantt

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Make Gantt charts for grants using shiny. 

```{r cars, message = F, warning = F, eval = F}
# make sure these are installed
library(shiny)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(tidyverse)
library(sortable)

runGithub("rbcavanaugh/gantt")
```
